reviews.review: Otimo jogo ainda mais pra mim que sou um mito do cs, um deus, apesar de passar raiva as vezes com a bosta do time que você pega na porra do competitivo, e pau no cu de quem usa hack HORRIVEL DO KRL, JOGO LIXO SEMPRE VAI SER UM LIXO

Dang. Sunk wayyyy to much time into this on the first day I got it. It runs nice even on terrible computers too.
most fun multiplayer FPS game available in the market...

This was my first time playing any version of CS in nearly six years, and I'd forgotten all the tricks—crouch to increase accuracy, walk to sneak up on enemies, take out the knife to run, camp whenever possible, and most of all. Making things even trickier, I had to familiarize myself with the slightly tweaked gameplay mechanics and new weapons that was put in CS:GO. Somehow, the game felt alien and  familiar fun.
Wer gut zielen kann, dem macht das Spiel spaß!
I recommend this game, very good graphics. Buy and appreciate

A real successor of good old CS. Its new matchmaking system allows you to play with people of nearly same skill as yours plus now you don't have to spend time trying to find good servers.
